artist: Attributed to Fra Mattia (Marco Giovanni della Robbia); Formerly attributed to Andrea della Robbia
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
life_date: Attributed to Fra Mattia (Marco Giovanni della Robbia), Italian (Florence), 1468–1532/34; Formerly attributed to Andrea della Robbia, Italian (Florence), 1435–1525
text: We are grateful to the scholar Federica Carta for clarifying the attribution of this tondo.
title: Madonna and Child with Saint John the Baptist in Tondo
